title: Charge laid after allegedly stolen vehicle crashes into Geelong school bus, officer opens fire
desc: A 43-year-old woman has been charged with handling stolen goods after a dramatic incident that saw police open fire at a vehicle that allegedly drove at officers after crashing into a bus on Thursday afternoon.

Pomida, BA Comm-4, The Centralian Link Intern   On January 27, 2026, the Central Philippine University College of Nursing Class of 2028 held its annual Capping, Pinning, and Candle Lighting Ceremony at the Rose Memorial Auditorium. title: Freed captive Sasha Troufanov reveals sexual harassment during Gaza captivity
desc: In BBC interview, ex-hostage recalls being captured by terrorists on Oct. 7 and shot in the legs while trying to flee, says Palestinian civilians beat him after he was abducted into Gaza

title: Penn Badgley On 'You Deserve Each Other' Body Transformation
desc: Although Penn Badgley is getting back to his romantic-comedy roots with 'You Deserve Each Other', he's going for a more superhero physique on screen.

title: Woman fatally struck by cube van in Brampton
desc: A 29-year-old woman is dead after being struck by a cube van in Brampton on Thursday night. Police say the driver remained at the scene.

title: What to know about the Nipah virus
